  # Initializer <a name="Initializer" id="cdktf.TestingAppOptions.Initializer"></a>

  ```python
  import cdktf
  
  cdktf.TestingAppOptions(
    enable_future_flags: bool = None,
    fake_cdktf_json_path: bool = None,
    outdir: str = None,
    stack_traces: bool = None,
    stub_version: bool = None
  )
  ```
